snippet: Greece rallied in the fourth quarter to beat the defending champion, Spain, 79-75, in the second round of the European Championships in Ljubljana, Slovenia.
lead_paragraph: Greece rallied in the fourth quarter to beat the defending champion, Spain, 79-75, in the second round of the European Championships in Ljubljana, Slovenia.

headline.main: Greece and Croatia Win at European Tournament
headline.print_headline: Greece and Croatia Win At European Tournament
